description: If you're a fan of margaritas, then this is the drink for you. Bulldog Strawberry Margaritas are made from scratch with fresh&nbsp;strawberries and tequila. The best part? They have a&nbsp;secret ingredient to make them extra special - beer!
name: Bulldog Strawberry Margarita

recipeInstructions.name: Add the margarita mix and tequila into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a large glass filled with ice, making sure the glass is only ¾ full.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the margarita mix and tequila into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a large glass filled with ice, making sure the glass is only ¾ full.

recipeInstructions.name: Open your beer. Tilt your glass and quickly put your beer upside down into the glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Open your beer. Tilt your glass and quickly put your beer upside down into the glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Serve with a straw and garnish with strawberry or lime!
recipeInstructions.text: Serve with a straw and garnish with strawberry or lime!
